forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West wind 16 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. West wind 16 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco is painted in hues of clarity and sunshine, with the gentle touch of a brisk west wind. A vibrant day arrives at a balmy high of about 62 degrees, a perfect backdrop as temperatures drift toward 60 in the afternoon warmth, whisking away any vestiges of fog that often linger along the coast. You might feel the playful dance of the wind at 16 to 22 mph, its gentle gusts reaching up to 26 mph—an invigorating nuance to the sunlit day.

As evening approaches, expect an invitation to the outdoors; the skies will remain mostly clear, wrapping the city in a soft, inviting glow as night falls around 53 degrees. The west winds continue into the night, whispering stories of the sea, gusting up to 25 mph. Consider donning a light sweater or jacket, perfect for the shifting breezes, as you stroll through the lively streets or enjoy a quiet moment at one of the city's many alluring parks. Today is perfect for meandering leisurely by the water, perhaps stopping by a local café, or indulging in the warmth of good company, all while soaking in the quintessential charm of this coastal metropolis.
